titleInfo.title: The behaviour of NH4+ in a water nanodrop encapsulated within a highly charged porous metal-oxide nanocontainer: A thermoanalytical study

mods.abstract: The properties and especially the thermal stability of NH4+ in a nanodrop of water encapsulated into a structurally well defined porous molybdenum-oxide based nanocontainer has been studied with thermoanalytical methods (TG/MS, DTA, DTG); this gives new insights into the behaviour of electrolytes under confined conditions. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Bielanski, A., Malecki, A., Lubanska, A., Diemann, E., Bögge, H. & Müller, A. (2008). The behaviour of NH4+ in a water nanodrop encapsulated within a highly charged porous metal-oxide nanocontainer: A thermoanalytical study. INORGANIC CHEMISTRY COMMUNICATIONS, 11(1), 110-113. ELSEVIER SCIENCE BV. doi:10.1016/j.inoche.2007.09.037.
